description: The REFERRAL_4 table is a continuation of the REFERRAL_3 which is continuation of the REFERRAL_2 table. These tables are the primary tables for referral information stored in the system.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: ATTEND_PROV_ADDR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the address ID of the attending provider. The format is as follows: SerID-AddressID. AddressID is the line number of the multiple response address items in the Provider (SER) master file. It can be used to print the correct address in a report or letter, for example.

columns.name: RFL_NET_LVL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Store the referral's network status


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


IN NETWORK


OUT OF NETWORK


N/A

columns.name: GEOGRAPHIC_AREA_ID
columns.description: Geographic area from ZIP code mapping.

columns.name: IN_OUT_OF_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description:
In or out-of-area classification from ZIP code mapping.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In


Out

columns.name: GEN_RFL_SEC_SINCE_MIDNIGHT_1
columns.description: Referral-level generic time item for general use.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_SEC_SINCE_MIDNIGHT_2
columns.description: Referral-level generic time item for general use.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_SEC_SINCE_MIDNIGHT_3
columns.description: Referral-level generic time item for general use.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_SEC_SINCE_MIDNIGHT_4
columns.description: Referral-level generic time item for general use.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_SEC_SINCE_MIDNIGHT_5
columns.description: Referral-level generic time item for general use.

columns.name: AUDIT_REF_TO_LOC_ID
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the original text for the referred-to location ID.

columns.name: AUDIT_REF_TO_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the original text for the referred to department ID.

columns.name: AUDIT_REFG_PROV_ID
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the original text for the referring provider ID.

columns.name: AUDIT_REFG_PROV_ADDR
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the original text for the referring provider address ID.

columns.name: AUDIT_REF_TO_PROV_ID
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals. It stores the original text for the referred-to provider ID.

columns.name: AUDIT_REF_TO_PROV_ADDR
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals.  It stores the original text for the referred-to provider address ID.

columns.name: AUDIT_RFL_SRC_LOC_ID
columns.description: This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals.  It stores the original text for the source referral location.

columns.name: RFL_DIRECTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The referral direction, as calculated by logic for transitions of care


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Internal


Incoming


Outgoing

columns.name: REFD_TO_LINK_PROV_YN
columns.description:
Is the referred to provider an EpicCare Link provider


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: REFD_TO_LINK_LOC_YN
columns.description:
Is the referred to location an EpicCare Link location


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: REFD_TO_LINK_PROV_YN

columns.name: IS_LEAKED_YN
columns.description:
Holds whether the referral is considered leaked


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: REFD_TO_LINK_PROV_YN

columns.name: TRIAGE_REMIND_DATE
columns.description: A date in the future when the user should be reminded of this referral.

columns.name: TRIAGE_INFO_RECPNT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The recipient of a request for more information. This item holds which item should be looked to for routing purposes.  


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None


Referred by Provider


Referred by Department


Referred by Location


PCP


Referral Source


Automatic Notification


Other

columns.name: CE_DISCONNECT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates that this referral is disconnected from the sending organization for Care Everywhere referrals.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: REFD_TO_LINK_PROV_YN

columns.name: RECENT_AUTH_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the most recent non-empty authorization reason for the referral. If this item is null, it means the referral was never authorized. If value is added/updated to the authorization code (I RFL 73), same value is copied into this item. But if authorization code (I RFL 73) is cleared, then this item is not updated.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RECENT_DENY_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the most recent non-empty denial reason for the  referral. If this item is null, it means the referral was never denied. If value is added/updated to the reason for denial (I RFL 18007), same value is copied into this item. But if reason for denial (I RFL 18007) is cleared, then this item is not updated.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TRIAGE_UNACCEPT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The unaccept reason that was specified when the triage decision changed from accept to no decision.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ADMITTING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The admitting provider related to an inpatient service. This item is only for Tapestry documentation purposes.

columns.name: EXPECTED_DISCHARGE_DATE
columns.description: The expected discharge date documented on the referral bed days form of referral entry.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_DATE_6_DT
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral date item 6.

columns.description: This contains information from generic referral date item 8.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_DATE_9_DT
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral date item 9.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_DATE_10_DT
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral date item 10.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_SEC_SINCE_MIDNIGHT_6
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral time item 6.
